title: SATCOM Ship-borne Terminal
explain: SATCOM ship-borne terminal supports multiple types of satellite communication service and high transmission rate, as well as supports Beidou B1/B3 navigation function. It equipped with “communication-on-the-move” antenna, and three-proof design is adopted to satisfy the operation in atrocious environment
form:
Main Specifications
Operation networksatellite mobile communication
Servicevoice, data (1.2~384kbps), short message, FAX and video
Navigation positioningBeidou/GPS
Operational temperature-20℃~55℃
Communication-on-the-move” antennasupporting automatic alignment to satellite and automatic tracking
